content: Hi, is there somewhere that has a full change history from DSTU2 to STU3. We are looking for changes from our current profiles so this would be handy. I am using the Compare to DSTU2 functionality from the website and also wanted to know if it was accurate?
It's relatively accurate. We'll be updating it before we make the final publication. There's also a history.html page that outlines some of the more significant changes.
The r2 diff tab on each reasource is code generated so should be very accurate (except that there may be some marked as added and removed rather than renamed, but we'll work on that before release)
Thanks Lloyd, that helps with the history page. And thanks Brian for confirming it's accurate. It will help a lot.
